meta_title: Fight a Speeding Ticket in Calgary | Fabsy
meta_description: Local guide to fighting speeding tickets in Calgary. Free eligibility check, disclosure requests, and trusted representation.
h1: Fight a Speeding Ticket in Calgary
hook: You may be able to dispute a speeding ticket in Calgary — start with a free eligibility check.
what: Fighting a speeding ticket means formally disputing the charge — request disclosure, review evidence, then decide how to proceed.
how: Request disclosure, gather photos/witnesses, and consider Fabsy's free eligibility review to determine next steps.
next: Upload a photo of your ticket for a free check.

faqs.a: It costs $488 for our core package with a zero-risk guarantee; you only pay if we save you money.
Usually not — we appear on your behalf for most violations. We will notify you if attendance is required.
faqs.q: Do I need to appear in court?

faqs.a: The process typically takes 3-6 months from submission to resolution.
